TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 37, "index": 13}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 15, "index": 20}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "black_stained_glass", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 56, "index": 31}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 33, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 45, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_shard", "quantity": 44, "index": 35}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 27, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 58, "index": 41}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 60, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_slab, I first need to craft dark_oak_planks. This requires placing a dark_oak_wood into the crafting table. I will move the dark_oak_wood from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
